fullplot: Determined to get engaged before her youngest sister's wedding, flight attendant Montana Moore (Paula Patton) finds herself with only 30 days to find Mr. Right. Using her airline connections to "accidentally" meet up with eligible ex-boyfriends and scour for potential candidates, she racks up more than 30,000 miles and countless comedic encounters, all the while searching for the perfect guy.
plot: Pledging to keep herself from being the oldest and the only woman in her entire family never to wed, Montana embarks on a thirty-day, thirty-thousand-mile expedition to charm a potential suitor into becoming her fiancè.
title: Baggage Claim

tomatoes.consensus: Baggage Claim hits the same notes as a number of successful romantic comedies without establishing much personality of its own.

writers: David E. Talbert (based on the novel entitled "Baggage Claim" by)
